favourite.article: This text and melody is very beautiful.
"My flesh and my heart fail, but God is the rock of my heart and my portion forever." Psalm 73:26

It would be so helpful if there was a way you could add people singing these songs. For those of us, not so musically inclined, who are trying to learn the songs to lead children in worship, it is much easier to pick it up when you've heard it sung. Thank you.

The Lord is my light and salvation, Whom shall I fear? My Lord, My God, My Beloved ...thank You for such an assurance...as long as I follow Your will...no matter how fearful the way may be...I know You are holding my hands...and You will not leave me nor forsake me.
I LOVE YOU, OH LORD JESUS...
The Lord is my light and salvation! WHOM SHALL I FEAR? Amen Lord!
I feel this hymn uplifts me to be faithful to Him whom I need to wait on always. Amen!

Oh I desire You Lord! I praise You for You are my light and salvation. Lord, I am confident in your lovingkindness towards me and I am so enriched by Your mercy. Lord, I shall not want anything else but YOU. I shall abide with my Savior forever. Amen.
Hear His voice. He comforts you with His almighty hand.
The Lord is my light and salvation. The Lord is the strength of my life. Praise the Lord that Christ is our life. Amen, Amen, Amen!
